modules.description: Transforms data between Cstruct buffers and string or Bigsubstring types using asynchronous pipes, enabling efficient data processing in networked applications. It routes data from a reader to a writer while converting the payload format during transit. Used to handle protocol-specific data encoding and decoding in real-time communication systems.

Provides functions for reading from and writing to C-like structures using Bigarray, enabling direct memory manipulation. Works with byte sequences and structured data layouts, such as network packet headers or binary file formats. Used to parse and construct low-level data representations in performance-critical applications.

Converts data between Cstruct buffers and string or Bigsubstring formats through asynchronous pipes, allowing real-time protocol encoding and decoding. It supports streaming data from a reader to a writer with format transformation, ideal for networked applications. Operations include reading, writing, and converting data in transit. Example uses include handling HTTP headers or binary protocols with minimal memory overhead.
